languages.text: "Интересно, скорбели бы вы столь трогательным образом о гибели Лорд-капитана, или сентиментальные чувства проснулись бы в вас только в тот момент, когда пустотный корабль нанес карательный удар с орбиты".
"I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."
languages.original_text: "Интересно, скорбели бы вы столь трогательным образом о гибели Лорд-капитана, или сентиментальные чувства проснулись бы в вас только в тот момент, когда пустотный корабль нанес карательный удар с орбиты".

traits.locale_text: "I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if these sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."
"I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if these sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."
"I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

"I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."
"I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

languages.text: "Ich frage mich, ob Ihr den Tod des Lord Captain so berührend betrauert hättet, oder ob derlei Gefühle nur von dem Geräusch Eures Raumschiffs geweckt worden wären, das zur Strafe einen Angriff aus dem Orbit führt."
languages.original_text: "I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

traits.locale_text: "Ich frage mich, ob Ihr den Tod des Lord Captain so berührend betrauert hättet, oder ob derlei Gefühle nur von dem Geräusch Eures Raumschiffs geweckt worden wären, das zur Strafe einen Angriff aus dem Orbit führt."

languages.text: « Je me demande si vous auriez pleuré {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec autant de sincérité, ou si votre chagrin ne se serait manifesté qu'en entendant le tir de notre frappe punitive depuis l'orbite. »
languages.original_text: "I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

traits.locale_text: « Je me demande si vous auriez pleuré {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec autant de sincérité, ou si votre chagrin ne se serait manifesté qu'en entendant le tir de notre frappe punitive depuis l'orbite. »

languages.text: “不知你们听说领主舰长的死讯时，是否也会表现出如此诚挚的哀悼。还是说，只有当我们的虚空舰从轨道上进行惩罚性打击时，才会唤醒你们心中这样的情感？”
languages.original_text: "I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

traits.locale_text: “不知你们听说领主舰长的死讯时，是否也会表现出如此诚挚的哀悼。还是说，只有当我们的虚空舰从轨道上进行惩罚性打击时，才会唤醒你们心中这样的情感？”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの死を涙ぐましく悼んでいたのか、軌道上からのヴォイドシップの砲撃の音でそのような感傷が呼び起こされたのかは怪しいところですね」
languages.original_text: "I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの死を涙ぐましく悼んでいたのか、軌道上からのヴォイドシップの砲撃の音でそのような感傷が呼び起こされたのかは怪しいところですな」

languages.text: «Me pregunto si lamentaría tanto la muerte {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, o si solo con el sonido de nuestra nave del vacío lanzando un ataque disciplinario desde la órbita experimentaría tales sentimientos».
languages.original_text: "I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

traits.locale_text: «Me pregunto si lamentaría tanto la muerte {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, o si solo con el sonido de nuestra nave del vacío lanzando un ataque disciplinario desde la órbita experimentaría tales sentimientos».

languages.text: "Acaba Lord Kaptan'ın ölümü karşısında da bu kadar dokunaklı şekilde yas tutar mıydınız? Yoksa bu tip duygular yalnızca yörüngeden bombardımana geçen uçsuz gemimizin sesiyle mi uyanırdı?"
languages.original_text: "I wonder if you would have so touchingly mourned the Lord Captain's death or if such sentiments would have only been awoken by the sound of our voidship delivering a punitive strike from orbit."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ın ölümü karşısında da bu kadar dokunaklı şekilde yas tutar mıydınız merak ediyorum. Belki de bu tip duygular ceza olarak yörüngeden saldırı düzenleyen uçsuz gemimizin sesini duyduğunuzda uyanırdı yalnızca."
